${modID}:NoWitnessesEvent.NAME: No Witnesses
DESCRIPTIONS: You #y~smell~ it before you see it, and follow the scent until you find it - a #rbloody #r~corpse~ lying against a wall. It #r@reeks@ of #rblood, but there's no signs of a struggle. He was injured somewhere else and bled out here. You offer a sympathetic moment of silence and turn to leave, but then that #r~burning,~ #r~twisting~ need rises up in your stomach. #r~Fresh.~ #r~No~ #r~witnesses.~ You could just...
You #r@hate@ giving in after coming this far, but here...you have to use everything you can to make it home. Food is food, and food is in short supply here.

#y~Nobody~ here to see, #y~nobody~ here to stop you...it'd be a shame to waste good food right? NL NL The wet #r@crunch@ and #r~sweet~ taste are over too soon, but your belly is full and you're ready to keep going.
#rNo. NL No, no, no, #r@absolutely@ not. NL You will #r@not@ be a #y@craven@ #y@coward@ that can't even hold a conviction anymore.
